price: Dijeron: "No nos importa, nos da igual si nos exhortas o no,
arabic: قَالُواْ سَوَآءٌ عَلَيۡنَآ أَوَعَظۡتَ أَمۡ لَمۡ تَكُن مِّنَ ٱلۡوَٰعِظِينَ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: qālū sawāon ʿalaynā awaʿaẓta am lam takun mina al-wāʿiẓīna
